text: læa phwk khea klaw a ni khux psusatw pla phuch phl thi hwngham wi sung mimi khır ca briphokh man di nxkcak phu thi rea prasngkh theanan dwy kar xang khxng phwk khea læa psusatw thi hlang khxng man thuk ham læa psusatw thi phwk khea ca mi klaw phra na mxallxh bn man thangni penkar xuplokn khwam thec kæ phraxngkh sung phraxngkh ca thrng txb thæn lbng thosʹ phwk khea fın sing thi phwk khea xuplokn khwam thec khun
